question: When the Central Bank feels that the asset prices in the country are near a bubble situation, it will most probably take the following steps?
option1: Inject liquidity in the system by conducting Open Market Operations
option2: Extract liquidity from the system by buying out rupees
option3: Inform the Government to tone down the market borrowings
option4: All of above measures will be taken
answer: Extract liquidity from the system by buying out rupees
